I would highly recommend!

review_detail.title: Great TV at a great price!
review_detail.content: This TV has a beautiful picture and great sound.  The TV in my bedroom went out and I needed a new one but much larger so I could watch it without my glasses.  I wanted Samsung because I trust the brand but I didn't want to spend over $400.  I bought this 40" within my price range with an Amazon gift card I won at work.  It arrived yesterday, was easy to set up and it absolutely perfect.  The picture is so clear (and large) I feel as if I am in the room with the people on TV.  The sound is very good as well.  Wonderful purchase.

Im sure i can get online in look into it but im not up to date on the technology these days....everything so far has been great...and i purchased this by reading alot of the reviews from amazon customers who also purchased thi tv...so thanks and hopefully 5 years from now i will still be loving it...

Product: Samsung Electronics UN40MU6290 40-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Anna
review_detail.title: Sumsung support service appeared much worse thay we could imaging!
review_detail.content: We bought it in the end of April 2018, after 1 month the shadow about  40% of the screen surface appeared. So you can still  watch, but one half is much darker than another. Ok, even good TV can have factory problem. We called Sumsung tech support in the end on May. Now it is middle of July, and we still have the problem not solved. The first send services guys to us, but they had replacement TV panel, but it was defective as well!)) Then Sumsung decided to replace the TV, but they have never called us, we have to call again and again, and each time they are telling us (very politely!), that these is progress with our issue!)))) That's sounds funny, but in fact it is not! I decided to buy Sumsung because of this brand reputation, and now this reputation is totally ruined in my view. I hope they will finally replace the TV, but this will not change the fact we had been watching World Cup with a huge dark area on brand new a few month old Sumsung TV...

I would have gone with another brand had I known this. Great TV though.

Product: Samsung Electronics UN40MU6290 40-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: Karry A Jones
review_detail.title: If only it worked...
review_detail.content: Picture quality and features are great...if it worked. The first television I received was broken out of the box. I returned it to Amazon and received a replacement TV. The replacement TV worked great for 2 WEEKS, then would not turn on, no power light, no signs of life. It has been 2 weeks since the replacement stopped working and 2 weeks since I contacted Samsung support for a repair. The repair man from USSI (Samsung's contracted repair service) just left my house and I am still left with a broken TV. He claimed the replacement parts he arrived with had an "out of box failure."

Samsung Electronics UN65MU7500 Curved 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2017 Model)

review_detail.author: suprflye
review_detail.title: It's like you jump through the screen
review_detail.content: Took some time to dial in all the settings, but once you do even regular cable HD looks amazing.  Then if you play some 4K videos from youtube or similar, it's simply amazing.  My buddy was just staring at the screen in amazement when I played some 4K videos.  I am sure OLED and QLED are better, but it's hard to imagine by how much more.  What's next, smellivision????

review_detail.author: dan
review_detail.title: The picture quality is amazing and the price is reasonable
review_detail.content: The picture quality is amazing and the price is reasonable. I chose Samsung because, from my experience, their products last. I still have a Samsung plasma tv from 2010. It's outlasted a Vizio LED TV (bought in 2011) and a Sharp 4K LED TV (bought in 2016). The Sharp replaced the Vizio. This time I came to my senses and went back to Samsung and honestly I couldn't be happier.
